question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [fly to the left side of the bridge. go forward to the end of the bridge. pass one road and take a right. fly over the short building near the park with the billboard on top. fly to the left down the road. fly down after you pass one road. go to the yellow billboard on the left over the building. go straight to the end of the park. go to the next road and fly over the buildings on the right. fly back to the left to the road and look at the billboard on the right. fly over the billboard and go straight. go around the right side of the building behind the yellow billboard. go to the road behind the sky scraper. turn left and look down the road. the red phone booths will be on your right. fly up and look left at the sky scraper. fly to the top and stop.]. When you move according to a series of movement instructions, what is your Landmark Position relative to the yellow billboard on the left side of the building?  
choose:  
A. I am located to the right of the yellow billboard on the left side of the building.  
B. I am located above the yellow billboard on the left side of the building.  
C. I am located under the yellow billboard on the left side of the building.  
D. I am located to the left of the yellow billboard on the left side of the building.  
E. I am located behind the yellow billboard on the left side of the building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The navigation instructions include "go to the yellow billboard on the left over the building," which implies that the agent reaches a point where the yellow billboard is directly ahead and above. Therefore, when the agent is at this specific landmark position relative to the yellow billboard, they would be located directly below it, making the correct interpretation that they are now positioned such that the billboard is above them. Thus, the correct option is B.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 137)]
Option: B
Reason: The navigation instruction "go to the yellow billboard on the left over the building" indicates that the agent will eventually be positioned such that the yellow billboard is above them. The video shows the agent flying towards the city, passing buildings, and eventually flying over a building. Therefore, the agent is located below the yellow billboard, making the billboard appear above them. Thus, the correct option is B.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The navigation instructions include "go to the yellow billboard on the left over the building," which implies that the agent reaches a point where the yellow billboard is directly ahead and above. Therefore, when the agent is at this specific landmark position relative to the yellow billboard, they would be located directly below it, making the correct interpretation that they are now positioned such that the billboard is above them. Thus, the correct option is B.
